p.k: Fact-based period drama starring Jodie Foster and Chow Yun-fat. An English governess initially clashes with her employer, the King of Siam
War drama. Darryl F Zanuck's classic Oscar-nominated recreation of the Allied landings in Normandy on 6 June 1944, with an all-star British, American
The third movie in the sci-fi action franchise. The discovery of a spacecraft on the dark side of the moon sparks another battle between the Autobots
Outrageous comedy. Dwayne Johnson stars in a racy reboot of the 1990s TV series. A team of beach lifeguards find themselves battling a drug lord
Violent horror starring Perdita Weeks. An explorer traces the philosopher's stone to the Paris catacombs. But it's not the only thing in those bone-lined tunnels. Strong language
Oscar-nominated drama. Two European expeditions, decades apart, rely on the same shaman to help them find a sacred healing plant deep in the Colombian Amazon. In Spanish/subs
